articles.content: One of Australias best known retailers is facing being offloaded, but one expert has warned there may not be room for both the likes of David Jones and Myer.Up-market department store David Jones cou… [+5056 chars]

articles.title: How to spot bad money advice on social media - ABC News
articles.description: Did you know if someone gives financial advice without a licence, they could face hefty fines and up to five years in prison?
articles.content:
Money advice is a pretty standard part of our feeds these days.
Reddit is full of stock tips. Instagram is stacked with slides about saving and budgeting. And TikTok's #moneytok has 11.8 billion vie… [+5063 chars]

articles.author: Madison Snow
articles.title: Environmentalists slam proposal for former Rio Tinto executive to join uranium mine leadership - ABC News
articles.description: Chris Salisbury was one of three senior executives who stepped down after the destruction of a 46,000-year-old sacred site at Juukan Gorge. He has been named as the proposed chair of a $658m merger with the company developing WA's first uranium mine.
